name: mezzio/mezzio
description: PSR-7 Middleware Microframework based on Stratigility

suggest.aura/di: 3.0.*@beta to make use of Aura.Di dependency injection container
suggest.filp/whoops: ^1.1 to use the Whoops error handler
suggest.laminas/laminas-servicemanager: ^2.5 to use laminas-servicemanager for dependency injection
suggest.mezzio/mezzio-aurarouter: ^1.0 to use the Aura.Router routing adapter
suggest.mezzio/mezzio-fastroute: ^1.0 to use the FastRoute routing adapter
suggest.mezzio/mezzio-laminasrouter: ^1.0 to use the laminas-mvc routing adapter
suggest.mezzio/mezzio-laminasviewrenderer: ^1.0 to use the laminas-view PhpRenderer template renderer
suggest.mezzio/mezzio-platesrenderer: ^1.0 to use the Plates template renderer
suggest.mezzio/mezzio-twigrenderer: ^1.0 to use the Twig template renderer
suggest.mouf/pimple-interop: ^1.0 to use Pimple for dependency injection
